mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reserve WHERE memberId=#{memberId}

SELECT c.reserveNo as reserveNo, c.seat as seat, c.scheduleNo as scheduleNo, c.adultNum as adultNum, c.teenNum as teenNum, c.status as status, to_char(c.scheduleDate, 'yyyymmdd') as scheduleDate, c.scheduleTime as scheduleTime, c.movieNo as movieNo, c.movieTitle as movieTitle FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, r.*, s.scheduleNo as originscheduleNo, s.scheduleDate, s.scheduleTime, s.screen, s.movieNo, m.movieTitle FROM reserve r, schedule s, movie m WHERE memberId=#{memberId} and r.scheduleNo = s.scheduleNo and s.movieNo = m.movieNo AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ORDER BY status, s.scheduleDate, s.scheduleTime ) c WHERE c.rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

SELECT m.movieTitle, to_char(s.scheduleDate, 'yyyymmdd') as scheduleDate FROM movie m, schedule s, reserve r WHERE r.scheduleNo = s.scheduleNo and s.movieNo = m.movieNo and memberId=#{memberId} and rownum <= 20
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET status = 1 WHERE reserveNo IN ( SELECT r.reserveNo FROM reserve r, schedule s WHERE r.scheduleNo = s.scheduleNo AND to_char(scheduleDate, 'yyyyMMdd') <= #{scheduleDate} AND scheduleTime <= #{time} and status IN (0, 3) )

UPDATE reserve SET status = 3 WHERE reserveNo IN ( SELECT reserveNo FROM reserve r, schedule s WHERE r.scheduleNo = s.scheduleNo AND to_char(scheduleDate, 'yyyymmdd') = #{scheduleDate} AND (to_date(scheduleTime, 'HH24:MI') - to_date(#{time}, 'HH24:MI'))*24*60 < 30 AND status = 0 )
UPDATE reserve SET status = 2 WHERE reserveNo = #{reserveNo}
